lead_paragraph: This season’s books about Hollywood feature (among others) Barbra Streisand, Stanley Kubrick and Meryl Streep.

headline.main: Hollywood: ‘Stanley Kubrick and Me,’ and More

snippet: This season’s books about Hollywood feature (among others) Barbra Streisand, Stanley Kubrick and Meryl Streep.
abstract: Lisa Schwarzbaum reviews books Stanley Kubrick and Me: Thirty Years at His Side by Emilio D'Alessandro, Barbra Streisand: Redefining Beauty, Femininity, and Power by Neal Gabler, A Girl's Got To Breathe: The Life of Teresa Wright by Donald Spoto, Her Again: Becoming Meryl Streep by Michael Schulman, Life Moves Pretty Fast: The Lessons We Learned From Eighties Movies (and Why We Don't Learn Them From Movies Anymore) by Hadley Freeman and Dirty Words and Filthy Pictures: Film and the First Amendment by Jeremy Geltzer.
